pyNetLogo documentation¶

To do: check Mac support and handling of custom directories

class pyNetLogo.NetLogoLink(gui=False, thd=False, netlogo_home=None, netlogo_version=None, jvm_home=None)¶

Create a link with NetLogo. Underneath, the NetLogo JVM is started through Jpype.

command(netlogo_command)¶

Execute the supplied command in NetLogo

Parameters:netlogo_command – a string with a valid netlogo command
Raises:NetLogoException in case of either a LogoException or CompilerException being raised by netlogo.
kill_workspace()¶

Close NetLogo and shut down the JVM.

load_model(path)¶

Load a NetLogo model.

Parameters:path – the absolute path to the NetLogo model
Raises:IOError in case the model is not found
Raises:NetLogoException wrapped around NetLogo exceptions.
patch_report(netlogo_reporter)¶

Reports a Pandas dataframe with the same shape as the NetLogo world, with column labels and row indices following pxcor and pycor patch coordinates. The values of the dataframe correspond to patch attributes.

Parameters:netlogo_reporter – valid patch attribute
Raises:NetlogoException
Returns:Dataframe containing NetLogo patch attributes
patch_set(attribute, data)¶

Set patch attributes from a Pandas dataframe

Parameters:
  • attribute – valid NetLogo patch attribute
  • data – Pandas dataframe with same dimensions as NetLogo world, containing values to be set
Raises:

NetLogoException
repeat_command(netlogo_command, reps)¶

Execute the supplied command in NetLogo a given number of times

Parameters:
  • netlogo_command – string with a valid NetLogo command
  • reps – int, number of times to repeat commands
Raises:

NetLogoException
repeat_report(netlogo_reporter, reps)¶

Execute a reporter (or multiple reporters if a list of strings is given as input) over a number of ticks.

Parameters:
  • netlogo_reporter – valid NetLogo reporters (string or list of strings)
  • reps – int, number of ticks for which to return values
Raises:

NetLogoException
Returns:

Dataframe of reported values indexed by ticks, with columns for each reporter.
report(netlogo_reporter)¶

Every reporter (commands which return a value) that can be called in the NetLogo Command Center can be called with this method.

Parameters:netlogo_reporter – a valid netlogo reporter
Raises:NetlogoException
write_NetLogo_attriblist(netlogo, agent_data, agent_name)¶

Update a set of NetLogo agents of the same type with attributes from a Pandas dataframe

Parameters:
  • netlogo – NetLogoLink object
  • agent_data – Pandas dataframe with a row for each agent, and columns for each attribute to update. Requires a ‘who’ column for the NetLogo agent ID
  • agent_name – String for the name of the NetLogo agent type to update (singular, e.g. a-sheep in the wolf-sheep predation example)
Raises:

NetLogoException
exception pyNetLogo.NetLogoException¶

Basic project exception
